name: article-templates-app
title: Article templates
description: Allows you to create and manage article templates, create a template from an existing article, and create new articles from templates to streamline your Knowledge Base workflow.
changeNotes:
Version 1.2.0

  • Template Locking: Added a "Locked for others" toggle. When enabled, only the template author and administrators can edit or delete the template. Others will see it in read-only mode (indicated by a view icon).
  • Project Binding: Templates can now be tied to a specific project. This restricts the template's usage to the selected project only.
  • Project Filtering: A new project filter in the dashboard helps you find templates related to specific projects.
  • Template Cloning: Quickly create a copy of any available template with the new "Clone" button.
